DOC.brief_title: A Single High-dose Oral Supplement Vitamin D Young Chinese
DOC.criteria: Healthy , young , Chinese Hans age 2535 year , include 25 35 year ; n't take vitamin D supplement past 6 month ; normal BMI ( 1825 kg/m2 ) ; baseline serum 25 ( OH ) D < 30 ng/ml ; willing follow instruction complete study . clinically diagnosed cardiovascular disease , gastrointestinal disease , endocrine , blood , liver , lung , kidney , nerve mental illness ; selfreported current use dietary supplement contain vitamin D within 6 month enrollment ; Severe anemia ( hemoglobin concentration < 70 g/L ) ; Serum 25 ( OH ) D â‰¥ 30 ng/mL enrollment ; participate research study within 3 month enrollment ; history drug dependence drug abuse ; History heavy drinking ( drink 14 cup per week , equivalent 360 mL beer 150 mL white wine 45 mL liquor per cup ) smoker ( 10 cigarette per day ) ; clinical abnormal blood biochemistry , hematology urine laboratory value ; current pregnancy lactation .
